category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 2 (Reception and transfer of review requests)
contents: Article 2 (Reception and transfer of review request) ① The National Pension Service (hereinafter referred to as *Service) shall comply with Article 108 of the National Pension Act (hereinafter referred to as *Act) and Article 88 of the Enforcement Decree of the same Act (hereinafter referred to as *Decree). The review request submitted in accordance with the regulations must be accepted and a receipt must be issued to the claimant. Revised September 16, 2022 ② When a request for review is received at a branch other than the branch that made the disposition that is the subject of an appeal for review (hereinafter referred to as *disposing branch), it must be stamped by the recipient and transferred to the disposing branch without delay. . ③ The disposing branch must transfer the written opinion in the attached Form No. 1 and all related materials to the department in charge of the examination request within 5 days from the date of receipt of the request for examination. Revised September 16, 2022. ④ The transfer under paragraphs 2 and 3 can be replaced by digitizing the data and registering it in the Corporation's electronic document management system [EDMS (Electronic Document Management System)]. ⑤ If the received request for review is a case under the jurisdiction of another agency, the Corporation must transfer it to the competent agency without delay. Newly established on September 16, 2022. ⑥ When the Corporation transfers a case pursuant to paragraph 5, it shall notify the applicant in writing of the relevant agency and the reason for the transfer. Newly established 2022. 9. 16.
